HSPC Body Temperature Measurement Method/Device

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-bodytempmethoddevice defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
30277 Digital ThermometerThe electronic thermometer that displays body temperature in numeric values.
30522 Infrared ThermometerThe thermometer that measure the temperature by the intensity of infrared light emission.
82735 Thermoluminescent diode thermometerThermoluminescent diode thermometer is a thermometer that measures the temperature of the emitted heat from the surface of an area.
84301 MRI diffusion thermometerMRI diffusion thermometer is an instrument that uses MRI diffusion to indicate the temperature of a substance.
